content: I want to use Finsupp α ℕ, where the default value of the Finsupp where the support does not exist is considered to be 1 (and the additive monoid to be considered as multiplication, of course). How exactly should I achieve this? I can't imagine I'm the first one to want this!
Multiplicative (Finsupp α (Additive ℕ)) might be nicer, since 1 is the constant function of all 1s
@Sky Wilshaw was thinking about this
I was working on a PR to add another parameter to finsupp but that was back in the mathlib3 days, I unfortunately never got round to it
